org.qcri.rheem.core.util.mathex

Interface Expression

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BinaryOperation, CompiledFunction, Constant, NamedFunction, UnaryOperation, Variable

    public interface Expression
    A mathematical expression that can be evaluated.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double evaluate(Context context) 
      static double evaluate(java.lang.String specification)
      Parse the given specification and evaluate it with the Context.baseContext.
      static double evaluate(java.lang.String specification, Context context)
      Parse the given specification and evaluate it with the given Context.
      default Expression specify(Context context)
      Turn this dynamic instance into a more static one by directly incorporating the given Context.

    • Method Detail

      • evaluate

        static double evaluate(java.lang.String specification)
                throws EvaluationException
        Parse the given specification and evaluate it with the Context.baseContext.
        Parameters:
        specification - a mathematical expression
        Returns:
        the result of the evaluation
        Throws:
        EvaluationException - if the evaluation failed
